titles.title: To express the sense of Congress that the Federal Pell Grant program should be a high funding priority.
To express the sense of Congress that the Federal Pell Grant program should be a high funding priority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the federal Pell Grant program: (1) is the largest federally-funded source of postsecondary grant aid and this country's largest single source of need-based grant aid; (2) plays a unique role in promoting economic and social mobility; and (3) should be a high funding priority.
